00022 /*
00023  * These tests exercise the llapi_layout API which abstracts the layout
00024  * of a Lustre file behind an opaque data type.  They assume a Lustre
00025  * file system with at least 2 OSTs and a pool containing at least the
00026  * first 2 OSTs.  For example,
00027  *
00028  *  sudo lctl pool_new lustre.testpool
00029  *  sudo lctl pool_add lustre.testpool OST[0-1]
00030  *  gcc -Wall -g -Werror -o llapi_layout_test llapi_layout_test.c -llustreapi
00031  *  sudo ./llapi_layout_test
00032  */
00033 
00034 #include <unistd.h>
00035 #include <stdlib.h>
00036 #include <stdio.h>
00037 #include <stdint.h>
00038 #include <fcntl.h>
00039 #include <sys/wait.h>
00040 #include <sys/signal.h>
00041 #include <sys/types.h>
00042 #include <errno.h>
00043 #include <lustre/lustreapi.h>
00044 #include <pwd.h>
00045 #include <limits.h>
00046 #include <sys/stat.h>
00047 #include <getopt.h>
00048 #include <inttypes.h>
00049 
00050 #define ERROR(fmt, ...)                                                 \
00051         fprintf(stderr, "%s: %s:%d: %s: " fmt "\n",                     \
00052                 program_invocation_short_name, __FILE__, __LINE__,      \
00053                 __func__, ## __VA_ARGS__);
00054 
00055 #define DIE(fmt, ...)                   \
00056 do {                                    \
00057         ERROR(fmt, ## __VA_ARGS__);     \
00058         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);             \
00059 } while (0)
00060 
00061 #define ASSERTF(cond, fmt, ...)                                         \
00062 do {                                                                    \
00063         if (!(cond))                                                    \
00064                 DIE("assertion '%s' failed: "fmt, #cond, ## __VA_ARGS__);\
00065 } while (0)                                                             \
00066 
00067 static char *lustre_dir;
00068 static char *poolname;
00069 static int num_osts = -1;
00070 
00071 void usage(char *prog)
00072 {
00073         printf("Usage: %s [-d lustre_dir] [-p pool_name] [-o num_osts]\n",
00074                prog);
00075         exit(0);
00076 }
00077 
00078 #define T0FILE                  "t0"
00079 #define T0_STRIPE_COUNT         num_osts
00080 #define T0_STRIPE_SIZE          1048576
00081 #define T0_OST_OFFSET           (num_osts - 1)
00082 #define T0_DESC         "Read/write layout attributes then create a file"
00083 void test0(void)
00084 {
00085         int rc;
00086         int fd;
00087         uint64_t count;
00088         uint64_t size;
00089         struct llapi_layout *layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00090         char path[PATH_MAX];
00091         char mypool[LOV_MAXPOOLNAME + 1] = { '\0' };
00092 
00093         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno %d", errno);
00094 
00095         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T0FILE);
00096 
00097         rc = unlink(path);
00098         ASSERTF(rc >= 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00099 
00100         /* stripe count */
00101         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(layout, T0_STRIPE_COUNT);
00102         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00103         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, &count);
00104         ASSERTF(rc == 0 && count == T0_STRIPE_COUNT, "%"PRIu64" != %d", count,
00105                 T0_STRIPE_COUNT);
00106 
00107         /* stripe size */
00108         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_set(layout, T0_STRIPE_SIZE);
00109         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00110         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(layout, &size);
00111         ASSERTF(rc == 0 && size == T0_STRIPE_SIZE, "%"PRIu64" != %d", size,
00112                 T0_STRIPE_SIZE);
00113 
00114         /* pool_name */
00115         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_set(layout, poolname);
00116         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00117         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_get(layout, mypool, sizeof(mypool));
00118         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00119         rc = strcmp(mypool, poolname);
00120         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "%s != %s", mypool, poolname);
00121 
00122         /* ost_index */
00123         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_set(layout, 0, T0_OST_OFFSET);
00124         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00125 
00126         /* create */
00127         fd = llapi_layout_file_create(path, 0, 0660, layout);
00128         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "path = %s, errno = %d", path, errno);
00129         rc = close(fd);
00130         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00131         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00132 }
00133 
00134 void __test1_helper(struct llapi_layout *layout)
00135 {
00136         uint64_t ost0;
00137         uint64_t ost1;
00138         uint64_t size;
00139         uint64_t count;
00140         int rc;
00141         char mypool[LOV_MAXPOOLNAME + 1] = { '\0' };
00142 
00143         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, &count);
00144         ASSERTF(count == T0_STRIPE_COUNT, "%"PRIu64" != %d", count,
00145                 T0_STRIPE_COUNT);
00146 
00147         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(layout, &size);
00148         ASSERTF(size == T0_STRIPE_SIZE, "%"PRIu64" != %d", size,
00149                 T0_STRIPE_SIZE);
00150 
00151         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_get(layout, mypool, sizeof(mypool));
00152         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00153         rc = strcmp(mypool, poolname);
00154         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "%s != %s", mypool, poolname);
00155 
00156         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_get(layout, 0, &ost0);
00157         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00158         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_get(layout, 1, &ost1);
00159         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00160         ASSERTF(ost0 == T0_OST_OFFSET, "%"PRIu64" != %d", ost0, T0_OST_OFFSET);
00161         ASSERTF(ost1 != ost0, "%"PRIu64" == %"PRIu64, ost0, ost1);
00162 }
00163 
00164 #define T1_DESC         "Read test0 file by path and verify attributes"
00165 void test1(void)
00166 {
00167         char path[PATH_MAX];
00168 
00169         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T0FILE);
00170         struct llapi_layout *layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00171         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00172         __test1_helper(layout);
00173         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00174 }
00175 
00176 #define T2_DESC         "Read test0 file by FD and verify attributes"
00177 void test2(void)
00178 {
00179         int fd;
00180         int rc;
00181         char path[PATH_MAX];
00182 
00183         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T0FILE);
00184 
00185         fd = open(path, O_RDONLY);
00186         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "open(%s): errno = %d", path, errno);
00187 
00188         struct llapi_layout *layout = llapi_layout_get_by_fd(fd, 0);
00189         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00190 
00191         rc = close(fd);
00192         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "close(%s): errno = %d", path, errno);
00193 
00194         __test1_helper(layout);
00195         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00196 }
00197 
00198 #define T3_DESC         "Read test0 file by FID and verify attributes"
00199 void test3(void)
00200 {
00201         int rc;
00202         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00203         lustre_fid fid;
00204         char fidstr[4096];
00205         char path[PATH_MAX];
00206 
00207         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T0FILE);
00208 
00209         rc = llapi_path2fid(path, &fid);
00210         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00211         snprintf(fidstr, sizeof(fidstr), "0x%"PRIx64":0x%x:0x%x",
00212                  (uint64_t)fid.f_seq, fid.f_oid, fid.f_ver);
00213         errno = 0;
00214         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_fid(path, &fid, 0);
00215         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "fidstr = %s, errno = %d", fidstr, errno);
00216 
00217         __test1_helper(layout);
00218         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00219 }
00220 
00221 #define T4FILE                  "t4"
00222 #define T4_STRIPE_COUNT         2
00223 #define T4_STRIPE_SIZE          2097152
00224 #define T4_DESC         "Verify compatibility with 'lfs setstripe'"
00225 void test4(void)
00226 {
00227         int rc;
00228         uint64_t ost0;
00229         uint64_t ost1;
00230         uint64_t count;
00231         uint64_t size;
00232         const char *lfs = getenv("LFS");
00233         char mypool[LOV_MAXPOOLNAME + 1] = { '\0' };
00234         char cmd[4096];
00235         char path[PATH_MAX];
00236 
00237         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T4FILE);
00238 
00239         if (lfs == NULL)
00240                 lfs = "/usr/bin/lfs";
00241 
00242         rc = unlink(path);
00243         ASSERTF(rc == 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00244 
00245         snprintf(cmd, sizeof(cmd), "%s setstripe %s %s -c %d -s %d %s", lfs,
00246                  strlen(poolname) > 0 ? "-p" : "", poolname, T4_STRIPE_COUNT,
00247                  T4_STRIPE_SIZE, path);
00248         rc = system(cmd);
00249         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "system(%s): exit status %d", cmd, WEXITSTATUS(rc));
00250 
00251         errno = 0;
00252         struct llapi_layout *layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00253         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00254 
00255         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, &count);
00256         ASSERTF(count == T4_STRIPE_COUNT, "%"PRIu64" != %d", count,
00257                 T4_STRIPE_COUNT);
00258 
00259         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(layout, &size);
00260         ASSERTF(size == T4_STRIPE_SIZE, "%"PRIu64" != %d", size,
00261                 T4_STRIPE_SIZE);
00262 
00263         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_get(layout, mypool, sizeof(mypool));
00264         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00265         rc = strcmp(mypool, poolname);
00266         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "%s != %s", mypool, poolname);
00267 
00268         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_get(layout, 0, &ost0);
00269         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00270         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_get(layout, 1, &ost1);
00271         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00272         ASSERTF(ost1 != ost0, "%"PRIu64" == %"PRIu64, ost0, ost1);
00273 
00274         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00275 }

00280 {
00281         int rc;
00282         char path[PATH_MAX];

00284 
00285         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T5FILE);
00286

00288         ASSERTF(rc == 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00289 
00290         errno = 0;
00291         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00292         ASSERTF(layout == NULL && errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00293 }

00295 #define T6_DESC         "llapi_layout_get_by_fd EBADF handling"
00296 void test6(void)
00297 {
00298         errno = 0;
00299         struct llapi_layout *layout = llapi_layout_get_by_fd(9999, 0);
00300         ASSERTF(layout == NULL && errno == EBADF, "errno = %d", errno);
00301 }
00302 
00303 #define T7FILE          "t7"
00304 #define T7_DESC         "llapi_layout_get_by_path EACCES handling"
00305 void test7(void)
00306 {
00307         int fd;
00308         int rc;
00309         uid_t myuid = getuid();
00310         char path[PATH_MAX];
00311         const char *runas = getenv("RUNAS_ID");
00312         struct passwd *pw;
00313         uid_t uid;
00314 
00315         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T7FILE);
00316         ASSERTF(myuid == 0, "myuid = %d", myuid); /* Need root for this test. */
00317 
00318         /* Create file as root */
00319         rc = unlink(path);
00320         ASSERTF(rc == 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00321 
00322         fd = open(path, O_CREAT, 0400);
00323         ASSERTF(fd > 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00324         rc = close(fd);
00325         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00326 
00327         /* Become unprivileged user */
00328         if (runas != NULL) {
00329                 uid = atoi(runas);
00330                 ASSERTF(uid != 0, "runas = %s", runas);
00331         } else {
00332                 pw = getpwnam("nobody");
00333                 ASSERTF(pw != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00334                 uid = pw->pw_uid;
00335         }
00336         rc = seteuid(uid);
00337         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00338         errno = 0;
00339         struct llapi_layout *layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00340         ASSERTF(layout == NULL && errno == EACCES, "errno = %d", errno);
00341         rc = seteuid(myuid);
00342         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00343 }
00344 
00345 /* llapi_layout_get_by_path() returns default layout for file with no
00346  * striping attributes. */
00347 #define T8FILE          "t8"
00348 #define T8_DESC         "llapi_layout_get_by_path ENODATA handling"
00349 void test8(void)
00350 {
00351         int fd;
00352         int rc;
00353         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00354         uint64_t count;
00355         uint64_t size;
00356         uint64_t pattern;
00357         char path[PATH_MAX];
00358 
00359         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T8FILE);
00360 
00361         rc = unlink(path);
00362         ASSERTF(rc >= 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00363         fd = open(path, O_CREAT, 0640);
00364         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00365         rc = close(fd);
00366         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00367 
00368         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00369         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d\n", errno);
00370 
00371         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, &count);
00372         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
00373         ASSERTF(count == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "count = %"PRIu64"\n", count);
00374 
00375         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(layout, &size);
00376         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
00377         ASSERTF(size == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "size = %"PRIu64"\n", size);
00378 
00379         rc = llapi_layout_pattern_get(layout, &pattern);
00380         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
00381         ASSERTF(pattern == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "pattern = %"PRIu64"\n",
00382                 pattern);
00383 
00384         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00385 }
00386 
00387 /* Verify llapi_layout_patter_set() return values for various inputs. */
00388 #define T9_DESC         "verify llapi_layout_pattern_set() return values"
00389 void test9(void)
00390 {
00391         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00392         int rc;
00393 
00394         layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00395         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d\n", errno);
00396 
00397         errno = 0;
00398         rc = llapi_layout_pattern_set(layout, LLAPI_LAYOUT_INVALID);
00399         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EOPNOTSUPP, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc,
00400                 errno);
00401 
00402         errno = 0;
00403         rc = llapi_layout_pattern_set(NULL, LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT);
00404         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc,
00405                 errno);
00406 
00407         errno = 0;
00408         rc = llapi_layout_pattern_set(layout, LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT);
00409         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00410 
00411         errno = 0;
00412         rc = llapi_layout_pattern_set(layout, LLAPI_LAYOUT_RAID0);
00413         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00414 
00415         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00416 }
00417 
00418 /* Verify stripe_count interfaces return errors as expected */
00419 #define T10_DESC        "stripe_count error handling"
00420 void test10(void)
00421 {
00422         int rc;
00423         uint64_t count;
00424         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00425 
00426         layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00427         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00428 
00429         /* invalid stripe count */
00430         errno = 0;
00431         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(layout, LLAPI_LAYOUT_INVALID);
00432         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00433 
00434         errno = 0;
00435         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(layout, -1);
00436         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00437 
00438         /* NULL layout */
00439         errno = 0;
00440         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(NULL, 2);
00441         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00442 
00443         /* NULL layout */
00444         errno = 0;
00445         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(NULL, &count);
00446         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00447 
00448         /* NULL count */
00449         errno = 0;
00450         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, NULL);
00451         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00452 
00453         /* stripe count too large */
00454         errno = 0;
00455         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(layout, LOV_MAX_STRIPE_COUNT + 1);
00456         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00457         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00458 }
00459 
00460 /* Verify stripe_size interfaces return errors as expected */
00461 #define T11_DESC        "stripe_size error handling"
00462 void test11(void)
00463 {
00464         int rc;
00465         uint64_t size;
00466         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00467 
00468         layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00469         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00470 
00471         /* negative stripe size */
00472         errno = 0;
00473         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_set(layout, -1);
00474         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00475 
00476         /* invalid stripe size */
00477         errno = 0;
00478         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_set(layout, LLAPI_LAYOUT_INVALID);
00479         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00480 
00481         /* stripe size too big */
00482         errno = 0;
00483         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_set(layout, (1ULL << 33));
00484         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00485 
00486         /* NULL layout */
00487         errno = 0;
00488         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_set(NULL, 1048576);
00489         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00490 
00491         errno = 0;
00492         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(NULL, &size);
00493         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00494 
00495         /* NULL size */
00496         errno = 0;
00497         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(layout, NULL);
00498         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00499 
00500         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00501 }

00503 /* Verify pool_name interfaces return errors as expected */
00504 #define T12_DESC        "pool_name error handling"
00505 void test12(void)
00506 {
00507         int rc;
00508         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00509         char mypool[LOV_MAXPOOLNAME + 1] = { '\0' };
00510 
00511         layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00512         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00513 
00514         /* NULL layout */
00515         errno = 0;
00516         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_set(NULL, "foo");
00517         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00518 
00519         /* NULL pool name */
00520         errno = 0;
00521         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_set(layout, NULL);
00522         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00523 
00524         /* NULL layout */
00525         errno = 0;
00526         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_get(NULL, mypool, sizeof(mypool));
00527         ASSERTF(errno == EINVAL, "poolname = %s, errno = %d", poolname, errno);
00528 
00529         /* NULL buffer */
00530         errno = 0;
00531         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_get(layout, NULL, sizeof(mypool));
00532         ASSERTF(errno == EINVAL, "poolname = %s, errno = %d", poolname, errno);
00533 
00534         /* Pool name too long*/
00535         errno = 0;
00536         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_set(layout, "0123456789abcdef");
00537         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00538 
00539         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00540 }
00541 
00542 /* Verify ost_index interface returns errors as expected */
00543 #define T13FILE                 "t13"
00544 #define T13_STRIPE_COUNT        2
00545 #define T13_DESC                "ost_index error handling"
00546 void test13(void)
00547 {
00548         int rc;
00549         int fd;
00550         uint64_t idx;
00551         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00552         char path[PATH_MAX];
00553 
00554         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T13FILE);
00555 
00556         layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00557         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00558 
00559         /* Only setting OST index for stripe 0 is supported for now. */
00560         errno = 0;
00561         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_set(layout, 1, 1);
00562         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EOPNOTSUPP, "rc = %d, errno = %d",
00563                 rc, errno);
00564 
00565         /* invalid OST index */
00566         errno = 0;
00567         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_set(layout, 0, LLAPI_LAYOUT_INVALID);
00568         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00569 
00570         errno = 0;
00571         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_set(layout, 0, -1);
00572         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00573 
00574         /* NULL layout */
00575         errno = 0;
00576         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_set(NULL, 0, 1);
00577         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00578 
00579         errno = 0;
00580         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_get(NULL, 0, &idx);
00581         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00582 
00583         /* NULL index */
00584         errno = 0;
00585         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_get(layout, 0, NULL);
00586         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00587 
00588         /* Layout not read from file so has no OST data. */
00589         errno = 0;
00590         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(layout, T13_STRIPE_COUNT);
00591         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00592         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_get(layout, 0, &idx);
00593         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00594 
00595         /* n greater than stripe count*/
00596         rc = unlink(path);
00597         ASSERTF(rc >= 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00598         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(layout, T13_STRIPE_COUNT);
00599         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00600         fd = llapi_layout_file_create(path, 0, 0644, layout);
00601         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00602         rc = close(fd);
00603         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00604         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00605 
00606         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00607         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00608         errno = 0;
00609         rc = llapi_layout_ost_index_get(layout, T13_STRIPE_COUNT + 1, &idx);
00610         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00611 
00612         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00613 }
00614 
00615 /* Verify llapi_layout_file_create() returns errors as expected */
00616 #define T14_DESC        "llapi_layout_file_create error handling"
00617 void test14(void)
00618 {
00619         int rc;
00620         struct llapi_layout *layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00621 
00622         /* NULL path */
00623         errno = 0;
00624         rc = llapi_layout_file_create(NULL, 0, 0, layout);
00625         ASSERTF(rc == -1 && errno == EINVAL, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00626 
00627         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00628 }
00629 
00630 /* Can't change striping attributes of existing file. */
00631 #define T15FILE                 "t15"
00632 #define T15_STRIPE_COUNT        2
00633 #define T15_DESC        "Can't change striping attributes of existing file"
00634 void test15(void)
00635 {
00636         int rc;
00637         int fd;
00638         uint64_t count;
00639         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00640         char path[PATH_MAX];
00641 
00642         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T15FILE);
00643 
00644         rc = unlink(path);
00645         ASSERTF(rc >= 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00646 
00647         layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00648         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00649         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(layout, T15_STRIPE_COUNT);
00650         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00651 
00652         errno = 0;
00653         fd = llapi_layout_file_create(path, 0, 0640, layout);
00654         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "fd = %d, errno = %d", fd, errno);
00655         rc = close(fd);
00656         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00657 
00658         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(layout, T15_STRIPE_COUNT - 1);
00659         errno = 0;
00660         fd = llapi_layout_file_open(path, 0, 0640, layout);
00661         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "fd = %d, errno = %d", fd, errno);
00662         rc = close(fd);
00663         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00664         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00665 
00666         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00667         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00668         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, &count);
00669         ASSERTF(rc == 0 && count == T15_STRIPE_COUNT,
00670                 "rc = %d, %"PRIu64" != %d", rc, count, T15_STRIPE_COUNT);
00671         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00672 }
00673 
00674 /* Default stripe attributes are applied as expected. */
00675 #define T16FILE         "t16"
00676 #define T16_DESC        "Default stripe attributes are applied as expected"
00677 void test16(void)
00678 {
00679         int             rc;
00680         int             fd;
00681         struct llapi_layout     *deflayout;
00682         struct llapi_layout     *filelayout;
00683         char            path[PATH_MAX];
00684         uint64_t        fsize;
00685         uint64_t        fcount;
00686         uint64_t        dsize;
00687         uint64_t        dcount;
00688 
00689         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T16FILE);
00690 
00691         rc = unlink(path);
00692         ASSERTF(rc == 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00693 
00694         deflayout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(lustre_dir, LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED);
00695         ASSERTF(deflayout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00696         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(deflayout, &dsize);
00697         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00698         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(deflayout, &dcount);
00699         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00700 
00701         /* First, with a default struct llapi_layout */
00702         filelayout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00703         ASSERTF(filelayout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00704 
00705         fd = llapi_layout_file_create(path, 0, 0640, filelayout);
00706         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00707 
00708         rc = close(fd);
00709         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00710 
00711         llapi_layout_free(filelayout);
00712 
00713         filelayout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00714         ASSERTF(filelayout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00715 
00716         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(filelayout, &fcount);
00717         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00718         ASSERTF(fcount == dcount, "%"PRIu64" != %"PRIu64, fcount, dcount);
00719 
00720         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(filelayout, &fsize);
00721         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00722         ASSERTF(fsize == dsize, "%"PRIu64" != %"PRIu64, fsize, dsize);
00723 
00724         /* NULL layout also implies default layout */
00725         rc = unlink(path);
00726         ASSERTF(rc == 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00727 
00728         fd = llapi_layout_file_create(path, 0, 0640, filelayout);
00729         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00730         rc = close(fd);
00731         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00732         filelayout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00733         ASSERTF(filelayout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00734 
00735         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(filelayout, &fcount);
00736         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00737         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(filelayout, &fsize);
00738         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00739         ASSERTF(fcount == dcount, "%"PRIu64" != %"PRIu64, fcount, dcount);
00740         ASSERTF(fsize == dsize, "%"PRIu64" != %"PRIu64, fsize, dsize);
00741 
00742         llapi_layout_free(filelayout);
00743         llapi_layout_free(deflayout);
00744 }
00745 
00746 /* Setting stripe count to LLAPI_LAYOUT_WIDE uses all available OSTs. */
00747 #define T17FILE         "t17"
00748 #define T17_DESC        "LLAPI_LAYOUT_WIDE is honored"
00749 void test17(void)
00750 {
00751         int rc;
00752         int fd;
00753         int osts_all;
00754         uint64_t osts_layout;
00755         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00756         char path[PATH_MAX];
00757 
00758         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T17FILE);
00759 
00760         rc = unlink(path);
00761         ASSERTF(rc == 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00762         layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00763         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00764         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(layout, LLAPI_LAYOUT_WIDE);
00765         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00766         fd = llapi_layout_file_create(path, 0, 0640, layout);
00767         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00768         rc = close(fd);
00769         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00770         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00771 
00772         /* Get number of available OSTs */
00773         fd = open(path, O_RDONLY);
00774         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00775         rc = llapi_lov_get_uuids(fd, NULL, &osts_all);
00776         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00777         rc = close(fd);
00778         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00779 
00780         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00781         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00782         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, &osts_layout);
00783         ASSERTF(osts_layout == osts_all, "%"PRIu64" != %d", osts_layout,
00784                 osts_all);
00785 
00786         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00787 }
00788 
00789 /* Setting pool with "fsname.pool" notation. */
00790 #define T18FILE         "t18"
00791 #define T18_DESC        "Setting pool with fsname.pool notation"
00792 void test18(void)
00793 {
00794         int rc;
00795         int fd;
00796         struct llapi_layout *layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00797         char path[PATH_MAX];
00798         char pool[LOV_MAXPOOLNAME*2 + 1];
00799         char mypool[LOV_MAXPOOLNAME + 1] = { '\0' };
00800 
00801         snprintf(pool, sizeof(pool), "lustre.%s", poolname);
00802 
00803         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T18FILE);
00804 
00805         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00806 
00807         rc = unlink(path);
00808         ASSERTF(rc == 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00809 
00810         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_set(layout, pool);
00811         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00812 
00813         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_get(layout, mypool, sizeof(mypool));
00814         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00815         rc = strcmp(mypool, poolname);
00816         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "%s != %s", mypool, poolname);
00817         fd = llapi_layout_file_create(path, 0, 0640, layout);
00818         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00819         rc = close(fd);
00820         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00821 
00822         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00823 
00824         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00825         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00826         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_get(layout, mypool, sizeof(mypool));
00827         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00828         rc = strcmp(mypool, poolname);
00829         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "%s != %s", mypool, poolname);
00830         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00831 }
00832 
00833 #define T19_DESC        "Maximum length pool name is NULL-terminated"
00834 void test19(void)
00835 {
00836         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00837         char *name = "0123456789abcde";
00838         char mypool[LOV_MAXPOOLNAME + 1] = { '\0' };
00839         int rc;
00840 
00841         layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00842         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00843         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_set(layout, name);
00844         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00845         rc = llapi_layout_pool_name_get(layout, mypool, sizeof(mypool));
00846         ASSERTF(strlen(name) == strlen(mypool), "name = %s, str = %s", name,
00847                 mypool);
00848         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00849 }

00851 #define T20FILE         "t20"
00852 #define T20_DESC        "LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT is honored"
00853 void test20(void)
00854 {
00855         int             rc;
00856         int             fd;
00857         struct llapi_layout     *deflayout;
00858         struct llapi_layout     *filelayout;
00859         char            path[PATH_MAX];
00860         uint64_t        fsize;
00861         uint64_t        fcount;
00862         uint64_t        dsize;
00863         uint64_t        dcount;
00864 
00865         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T20FILE);
00866 
00867         rc = unlink(path);
00868         ASSERTF(rc == 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00869 
00870         filelayout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00871         ASSERTF(filelayout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00872 
00873         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_set(filelayout, LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT);
00874         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00875 
00876         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(filelayout, LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT);
00877         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "rc = %d, errno = %d", rc, errno);
00878 
00879         fd = llapi_layout_file_create(path, 0, 0640, filelayout);
00880         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00881 
00882         rc = close(fd);
00883         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00884 
00885         llapi_layout_free(filelayout);
00886 
00887         deflayout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(lustre_dir, LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED);
00888         ASSERTF(deflayout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00889 
00890         filelayout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, 0);
00891         ASSERTF(filelayout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00892 
00893         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(filelayout, &fcount);
00894         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00895         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(deflayout, &dcount);
00896         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00897         ASSERTF(fcount == dcount, "%"PRIu64" != %"PRIu64, fcount, dcount);
00898 
00899         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(filelayout, &fsize);
00900         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00901         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(deflayout, &dsize);
00902         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00903         ASSERTF(fsize == dsize, "%"PRIu64" != %"PRIu64, fsize, dsize);
00904 
00905         llapi_layout_free(filelayout);
00906         llapi_layout_free(deflayout);
00907 }
00908 
00909 #define T21_DESC        "llapi_layout_file_create fails for non-Lustre file"
00910 void test21(void)
00911 {
00912         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00913         char template[PATH_MAX];
00914         int fd;
00915         int rc;
00916 
00917         snprintf(template, sizeof(template), "%s/XXXXXX", P_tmpdir);
00918         fd = mkstemp(template);
00919         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "template = %s, errno = %d", template, errno);
00920         rc = close(fd);
00921         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", fd);
00922         rc = unlink(template);
00923         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00924 
00925         layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00926         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d", errno);
00927 
00928         fd = llapi_layout_file_create(template, 0, 0640, layout);
00929         ASSERTF(fd == -1 && errno == ENOTTY,
00930                 "fd = %d, errno = %d, template = %s", fd, errno, template);
00931         llapi_layout_free(layout);
00932 }
00933 
00934 #define T22FILE         "t22"
00935 #define T22_DESC        "llapi_layout_file_create applied mode correctly"
00936 void test22(void)
00937 {
00938         int             rc;
00939         int             fd;
00940         char            path[PATH_MAX];
00941         struct stat     st;
00942         mode_t          mode_in = 0640;
00943         mode_t          mode_out;
00944         mode_t          umask_orig;
00945 
00946         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T22FILE);
00947 
00948         rc = unlink(path);
00949         ASSERTF(rc == 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
00950 
00951         umask_orig = umask(S_IWGRP | S_IWOTH);
00952 
00953         fd = llapi_layout_file_create(path, 0, mode_in, NULL);
00954         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00955 
00956         (void) umask(umask_orig);
00957 
00958         rc = fstat(fd, &st);
00959         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00960 
00961         rc = close(fd);
00962         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", fd);
00963 
00964         mode_out = st.st_mode & ~S_IFMT;
00965         ASSERTF(mode_in == mode_out, "%o != %o", mode_in, mode_out);
00966 }
00967 
00968 #define T23_DESC        "llapi_layout_get_by_path fails for non-Lustre file"
00969 void test23(void)
00970 {
00971         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00972         char template[PATH_MAX];
00973         int fd;
00974         int rc;
00975 
00976         snprintf(template, sizeof(template), "%s/XXXXXX", P_tmpdir);
00977         fd = mkstemp(template);
00978         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "template = %s, errno = %d", template, errno);
00979         rc = close(fd);
00980         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", fd);
00981 
00982         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(template, 0);
00983         ASSERTF(layout == NULL && errno == ENOTTY,
00984                 "errno = %d, template = %s", errno, template);
00985 
00986         rc = unlink(template);
00987         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
00988 }
00989 
00990 /* llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED) returns expected layout
00991  * for file with unspecified layout. */
00992 #define T24FILE         "t24"
00993 #define T24_DESC        "LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED works with existing file"
00994 void test24(void)
00995 {
00996         int fd;
00997         int rc;
00998         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00999         uint64_t count;
01000         uint64_t size;
01001         uint64_t pattern;
01002         char path[PATH_MAX];
01003 
01004         snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T24FILE);
01005 
01006         rc = unlink(path);
01007         ASSERTF(rc >= 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
01008         fd = open(path, O_CREAT, 0640);
01009         ASSERTF(fd >= 0, "errno = %d", errno);
01010         rc = close(fd);
01011         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
01012 
01013         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED);
01014         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01015 
01016         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, &count);
01017         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01018         ASSERTF(count != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "expected literal value");
01019 
01020         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(layout, &size);
01021         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01022         ASSERTF(size != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "expected literal value");
01023 
01024         rc = llapi_layout_pattern_get(layout, &pattern);
01025         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01026         ASSERTF(pattern != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "expected literal value");
01027 
01028         llapi_layout_free(layout);
01029 }
01030 
01031 /* llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED) returns expected layout
01032  * for directory with unspecified layout. */
01033 #define T25DIR          "d25"
01034 #define T25_DESC        "LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED works with directory"
01035 void test25(void)
01036 {
01037         int rc;
01038         struct llapi_layout *layout;
01039         uint64_t count;
01040         uint64_t size;
01041         uint64_t pattern;
01042         char dir[PATH_MAX];
01043 
01044         snprintf(dir, sizeof(dir), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T25DIR);
01045 
01046         rc = rmdir(dir);
01047         ASSERTF(rc >= 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
01048         rc = mkdir(dir, 0750);
01049         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
01050 
01051         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(dir, LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED);
01052         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01053 
01054         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, &count);
01055         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01056         ASSERTF(count != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "expected literal value");
01057 
01058         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(layout, &size);
01059         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01060         ASSERTF(size != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "expected literal value");
01061 
01062         rc = llapi_layout_pattern_get(layout, &pattern);
01063         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01064         ASSERTF(pattern != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "expected literal value");
01065 
01066         llapi_layout_free(layout);
01067 }
01068 
01069 /* llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED) correctly combines
01070  * specified attributes of parent directory with attributes filesystem root. */
01071 #define T26DIR          "d26"
01072 #define T26_DESC        "LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED partially specified parent"
01073 #define T26_STRIPE_SIZE (1048576 * 4)
01074 void test26(void)
01075 {
01076         int rc;
01077         struct llapi_layout *layout;
01078         const char *lfs = getenv("LFS");
01079         uint64_t count;
01080         uint64_t size;
01081         uint64_t pattern;
01082         char dir[PATH_MAX];
01083         char cmd[4096];
01084 
01085         snprintf(dir, sizeof(dir), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T26DIR);
01086         rc = rmdir(dir);
01087         ASSERTF(rc >= 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
01088         rc = mkdir(dir, 0750);
01089         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
01090 
01091         if (lfs == NULL)
01092                 lfs = "/usr/bin/lfs";
01093 
01094         snprintf(cmd, sizeof(cmd), "%s setstripe -s %d %s", lfs,
01095                  T26_STRIPE_SIZE, dir);
01096         rc = system(cmd);
01097         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "system(%s): exit status %d", cmd, WEXITSTATUS(rc));
01098 
01099         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(dir, LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED);
01100         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01101 
01102         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, &count);
01103         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01104         ASSERTF(count != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "expected literal value");
01105 
01106         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(layout, &size);
01107         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01108         ASSERTF(size == T26_STRIPE_SIZE, "size = %"PRIu64, size);
01109 
01110         rc = llapi_layout_pattern_get(layout, &pattern);
01111         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01112         ASSERTF(pattern != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "expected literal value");
01113 
01114         llapi_layout_free(layout);
01115 }
01116 
01117 /* llapi_layout_get_by_path(path, LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED) work with
01118  * non existing file. */
01119 #define T27DIR          "d27"
01120 #define T27_DESC        "LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED with non existing file"
01121 #define T27_STRIPE_SIZE (1048576 * 3)
01122 void test27(void)
01123 {
01124         int rc;
01125         struct llapi_layout *layout;
01126         const char *lfs = getenv("LFS");
01127         uint64_t count;
01128         uint64_t size;
01129         uint64_t pattern;
01130         char dirpath[PATH_MAX];
01131         char filepath[PATH_MAX];
01132         char cmd[4096];
01133 
01134         snprintf(dirpath, sizeof(dirpath), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T27DIR);
01135         snprintf(filepath, sizeof(filepath), "%s/nonesuch", dirpath);
01136 
01137         rc = rmdir(dirpath);
01138         ASSERTF(rc >= 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
01139         rc = mkdir(dirpath, 0750);
01140         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
01141 
01142         if (lfs == NULL)
01143                 lfs = "/usr/bin/lfs";
01144 
01145         snprintf(cmd, sizeof(cmd), "%s setstripe -s %d %s", lfs,
01146                  T27_STRIPE_SIZE, dirpath);
01147         rc = system(cmd);
01148         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "system(%s): exit status %d", cmd, WEXITSTATUS(rc));
01149 
01150         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(filepath, LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED);
01151         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01152 
01153         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, &count);
01154         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01155         ASSERTF(count != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "expected literal value");
01156 
01157         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(layout, &size);
01158         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01159         ASSERTF(size == T27_STRIPE_SIZE, "size = %"PRIu64, size);
01160 
01161         rc = llapi_layout_pattern_get(layout, &pattern);
01162         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01163         ASSERTF(pattern != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT, "expected literal value");
01164 
01165         llapi_layout_free(layout);
01166 }
01167 
01168 /* llapi_layout_stripe_count_get returns LLAPI_LAYOUT_WIDE for a directory
01169  * with a stripe_count of -1. */
01170 #define T28DIR          "d28"
01171 #define T28_DESC        "LLAPI_LAYOUT_WIDE returned as expected"
01172 void test28(void)
01173 {
01174         int rc;
01175         struct llapi_layout *layout;
01176         const char *lfs = getenv("LFS");
01177         uint64_t count;
01178         char dirpath[PATH_MAX];
01179         char cmd[4096];
01180 
01181         snprintf(dirpath, sizeof(dirpath), "%s/%s", lustre_dir, T28DIR);
01182 
01183         rc = rmdir(dirpath);
01184         ASSERTF(rc >= 0 || errno == ENOENT, "errno = %d", errno);
01185         rc = mkdir(dirpath, 0750);
01186         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d", errno);
01187 
01188         if (lfs == NULL)
01189                 lfs = "/usr/bin/lfs";
01190 
01191         snprintf(cmd, sizeof(cmd), "%s setstripe -c -1 %s", lfs, dirpath);
01192         rc = system(cmd);
01193         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "system(%s): exit status %d", cmd, WEXITSTATUS(rc));
01194 
01195         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(dirpath, 0);
01196         ASSERTF(layout != NULL, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01197 
01198         rc = llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(layout, &count);
01199         ASSERTF(rc == 0, "errno = %d\n", errno);
01200         ASSERTF(count == LLAPI_LAYOUT_WIDE, "count = %"PRIu64"\n", count);
01201 
01202         llapi_layout_free(layout);
01203 }
01204 
01205 #define TEST_DESC_LEN   50
01206 struct test_tbl_entry {
01207         void (*tte_fn)(void);
01208         char tte_desc[TEST_DESC_LEN];
01209         bool tte_skip;
01210 };
01211 
01212 static struct test_tbl_entry test_tbl[] = {
01213         { &test0,  T0_DESC, false },
01214         { &test1,  T1_DESC, false },
01215         { &test2,  T2_DESC, false },
01216         { &test3,  T3_DESC, false },
01217         { &test4,  T4_DESC, false },
01218         { &test5,  T5_DESC, false },
01219         { &test6,  T6_DESC, false },
01220         { &test7,  T7_DESC, false },
01221         { &test8,  T8_DESC, false },
01222         { &test9,  T9_DESC, false },
01223         { &test10, T10_DESC, false },
01224         { &test11, T11_DESC, false },
01225         { &test12, T12_DESC, false },
01226         { &test13, T13_DESC, false },
01227         { &test14, T14_DESC, false },
01228         { &test15, T15_DESC, false },
01229         { &test16, T16_DESC, false },
01230         { &test17, T17_DESC, false },
01231         { &test18, T18_DESC, false },
01232         { &test19, T19_DESC, false },
01233         { &test20, T20_DESC, false },
01234         { &test21, T21_DESC, false },
01235         { &test22, T22_DESC, false },
01236         { &test23, T23_DESC, false },
01237         { &test24, T24_DESC, false },
01238         { &test25, T25_DESC, false },
01239         { &test26, T26_DESC, false },
01240         { &test27, T27_DESC, false },
01241         { &test28, T28_DESC, false },
01242 };
01243 #define NUM_TESTS       (sizeof(test_tbl) / sizeof(struct test_tbl_entry))
01244 
01245 void print_test_desc(int test_num, const char *test_desc, const char *status)
01246 {
01247         int i;
01248 
01249         printf(" test %2d: %s ", test_num, test_desc);
01250         for (i = 0; i < TEST_DESC_LEN - strlen(test_desc); i++)
01251                 printf(".");
01252         printf(" %s\n", status);
01253 }
01254 
01255 /* This function runs a single test by forking the process.  This way,
01256  * if there is a segfault during a test, the test program won't crash. */
01257 int test(void (*test_fn)(), const char *test_desc, bool test_skip, int test_num)
01258 {
01259         int rc = 0;
01260         pid_t pid;
01261         char status_buf[128];
01262 
01263         if (test_skip) {
01264                 print_test_desc(test_num, test_desc, "skip");
01265                 return 0;
01266         }
01267 
01268         pid = fork();
01269         if (pid < 0) {
01270                 ERROR("cannot fork: %s", strerror(errno));
01271         } else if (pid > 0) {
01272                 int status = 0;
01273 
01274                 /* Non-zero value indicates failure. */
01275                 wait(&status);
01276                 if (status == 0) {
01277                         strncpy(status_buf, "pass", sizeof(status_buf));
01278                 } else if WIFSIGNALED(status) {
01279                         snprintf(status_buf, sizeof(status_buf),
01280                                  "fail (exit status %d, killed by SIG%d)",
01281                                  WEXITSTATUS(status), WTERMSIG(status));
01282                         rc = -1;
01283                 } else {
01284                         snprintf(status_buf, sizeof(status_buf),
01285                                  "fail (exit status %d)", WEXITSTATUS(status));
01286                         rc = -1;
01287                 }
01288                 print_test_desc(test_num, test_desc, status_buf);
01289         } else if (pid == 0) {
01290                 /* Run the test in the child process.  Exit with 0 for success,
01291                  * non-zero for failure */
01292                 test_fn();
01293                 exit(0);
01294         }
01295 
01296         return rc;
01297 }
01298 
01299 static void process_args(int argc, char *argv[])
01300 {
01301         int c;
01302 
01303         while ((c = getopt(argc, argv, "d:p:o:")) != -1) {
01304                 switch (c) {
01305                 case 'd':
01306                         lustre_dir = optarg;
01307                         break;
01308                 case 'p':
01309                         poolname = optarg;
01310                         break;
01311                 case 'o':
01312                         num_osts = atoi(optarg);
01313                         break;
01314                 case '?':
01315                         fprintf(stderr, "Unknown option '%c'\n", optopt);
01316                         usage(argv[0]);
01317                 }
01318         }
01319 }
01320 
01321 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
01322 {
01323         int rc = 0;
01324         int i;
01325         struct stat s;
01326         char fsname[8 + 1];
01327 
01328         llapi_msg_set_level(LLAPI_MSG_OFF);
01329 
01330         process_args(argc, argv);
01331         if (lustre_dir == NULL)
01332                 lustre_dir = "/mnt/lustre";
01333         if (poolname == NULL)
01334                 poolname = "testpool";
01335         if (num_osts == -1)
01336                 num_osts = 2;
01337 
01338         if (num_osts < 2)
01339                 DIE("Error: at least 2 OSTS are required\n");
01340 
01341         if (stat(lustre_dir, &s) < 0)
01342                 DIE("cannot stat %s: %s\n", lustre_dir, strerror(errno));
01343         else if (!S_ISDIR(s.st_mode))
01344                 DIE("%s: not a directory\n", lustre_dir);
01345 
01346         rc = llapi_search_fsname(lustre_dir, fsname);
01347         if (rc != 0) {
01348                 fprintf(stderr, "Error: %s: not a Lustre filesystem\n",
01349                         lustre_dir);
01350                 exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
01351         }
01352 
01353         /* Play nice with Lustre test scripts. Non-line buffered output
01354          * stream under I/O redirection may appear incorrectly. */
01355         setvbuf(stdout, NULL, _IOLBF, 0);
01356 
01357         for (i = 0; i < NUM_TESTS; i++) {
01358                 struct test_tbl_entry *tst = &test_tbl[i];
01359                 if (test(tst->tte_fn, tst->tte_desc, tst->tte_skip, i) != 0)
01360                         rc++;
01361         }
01362         return rc;
01363 }
